name: Tab Color and Rounding (Background and Text)
description:
A Personal style that allows you to alter the color and rounding of your Tab's, menu, Toolbars and Text.
This one is made to work with Vertical Tabs and (preferably) no theme or persona.

Based on style 33570 by user 838

Made this cause my tabs weren't colored correctly with the use of:
Vertical Tabs (0.8) https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/vertical-tabs/
style 33773 (by user 15980)

**Also This is my first submitted style**
